      • setStationaryTime

        public void setStationaryTime()
        Sets the stationary time to now when the Ghost started standing still. Started standing still means pressing no moving keys.

      • getStationaryTime

        public Calendar getStationaryTime()
        Returns:
        the time when the Ghost started standing still.

      • reset

      • possess

        public void possess(Game game)
        This possesses a human, this ghost becomes the human, the previous human becomes a ghost (with his own coloured sprites).
        Parameters:
        game -

      • changeAppearance

        public void changeAppearance()
        Changes the appearance of the ghost, it becomes a wall or a ghost. If the isGhost true and it will become "a wall" then the stationaryTime has to be at least 1,5 seconds ago. So the ghost object can't become "a wall" immediately.

      • vanish

        public void vanish(Game game)
        Respawns the ghost when hit by the flashlight. If there aren't remaining lifes for the ghost then the ghost dead attribute will be set to true. The ghost whil respawn when the timeOfDeath is 3 seconds ago.
        Parameters:
        game -

      • getHitboxPoints

        public List<Point2D> getHitboxPoints()
